What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? SO AI had Glint Hawk Idol and Inkmoth Nexus and MtL. 
AI used counter power for all creatures and these 2 plus others got the counter. 
Ok, but then afterwards they revert back to land and artifact and are no longer creatures. 
But the next turn they changed into creatures again and had the counter still on them. 
This should not be? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.26
Windows 7 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.

title: Mikaues the Lunarch - counters still on land/artifacts that go in and out of creature status

comments.body:
Thanks for reporting, but this is how it should behave according to the rules. 
See http://blogs.magicjudges.org/rulestips/2011/12/animated-lands-keep-counters-even-when-they-dont-matter/

**Status:** WontFix
